dict.acceptation: 起初，原来；独创地，独出心裁地；自来；本；

sent.orig: Brazil dominates the production of coffee, originally from Ethiopia, and of sugar, originally from New Guinea.
sent.trans: 巴西统治着咖啡和糖类生产，它们最初分别产自埃塞俄比亚和新几内亚。

sent.orig: Remember fondly long long, the affair forgotten originally all thought of a while.
sent.trans: 思念长长的，原来忘记的事情一下子都想起来了。

sent.orig: Originally the old man lived in Shandong Province.
sent.trans: 这位老人原本住在山东。

sent.orig: B So, where are you from originally?
A marble-sized ball, originally of camphor but now of naphthalene, stored with clothes to repel moths.
sent.trans: 用来使蛀虫远离储存的衣服的樟脑或萘的小圆球。
